rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: The entrance hall leads to a combined living and dining area with an open-plan Mediterranean style, featuring warm color palettes and decorative detailing. Vastu principles ensure a welcoming energy by placing the main door on the east.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen with modern appliances and storage solutions, designed for efficient workflow, keeping in mind local building norms and ensuring proper ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom is placed on the west side for restful energy. It includes built-in closets and ample natural lighting, aligning with Mediterranean aesthetics.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom designed with sufficient space and a private balcony. Adheres to Vastu recommendations by ensuring the bed is placed in a calm corner away from heavy traffic areas.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office located near the master bedroom for convenience, incorporating Mediterranean design elements and natural lighting to boost productivity.

rooms.name: Bathroom - Ground Floor
rooms.description: A functional bathroom with local fixtures. Vastu recommends placing the washbasin in a particular corner for optimal energy flow.

additional_features.name: Central Courtyard
additional_features.description: An open central courtyard that serves as a communal space, promoting relaxation and interaction. The courtyard is designed following Vastu guidelines to balance natural energies.
